title: TV stolen now i got to use an old tv hooked up through dvi now games wont launch
body: My TV was stolen so i had to switch to an old tv i had hooked up to a dvi to dvi cable now when i go through champ select i get to pick champions but when i get to load screen it doesnt show up and i get this message about my directx problem check my video drivers and i have a nvidia 760. went to geforce experiance updated my drivers and still cant play league.

replies.body:
Oh mah glob! We on social media and the tech team offer our condolences on that stolen TV =(.

That might be happening if the in-game resolution isn't matching what the tv is set to. Let's do a quick config reset and that should hopefully help out, but hit up our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if this doesn't seem to help at all.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
